did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Council of School Superintendents, Cities and Villages, State of New York.

did.physdesc: Minutes, financial records, correspondence, audiotape, transcript, microfilm, and other materials.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of annual meetings, committee files and financial records, correspondence, membership lists of the Council of School Superintendents. Also, tape and transcript of round table discussion conducted by Sam Bishop, January 17, 1967; and one reel of negative microfilm of Enna Smith Burdick's "Edward Smith, Syracuse Schoolmaster," M.S. thesis, 1940, Syracuse University.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Council of School Superintendents merged with the Association of School District Administrators of New York State on September 1, 1967. The new organization was named the New York State Council of School District Administrators.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of annual meetings, committee files and financial records, correspondence, membership lists of the Council of School Superintendents. Also, tape and transcript of round table discussion conducted by Sam Bishop, January 17, 1967; and one reel of negative microfilm of Enna Smith Burdick's "Edward Smith, Syracuse Schoolmaster," M.S. thesis, 1940, Syracuse University.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Council of School Superintendents, Cities and Villages, State of New York.
Association of School District Administrators of New York State.
New York State Council of School District Administrators.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Council of School Superintendents records, #2750. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Folders labeled chronologically, "Annual Meetings," from 1883 through 1967
Also, inserted chronologically are folders labeled "Misc." for the following years:
NYS Council List of Committees, Program for Grossinger's, List of Supts.
NYS Council Comm. on Info. and Hospitality
NYS Council Gross. Planning Com. Comm.
Relationship and Responsibility of State Educ. Dept.
NYS Review and Report on Candidates for Office in A.A.S.A.
NYS Council Supts Convention, Sept. 1962 Concord
Committee on Merging Dist. Supts and Supts
Council of Supts. Vouchers - Approved, Fiscal Year 1961-1962
Council of School Supts. Vouchers - Approved, Fiscal Year 1960-1961
Council of School Supts Financial Reports of Fiscal Year 1961-1962
Council of School Supts Financial Statement, 1962-1963
Council of School Supts Vouchers - Approved, Current Year 1962-1963 - a
Council of School Supts Vouchers - Approved, Current Year 1962-1963 - b
Council of School Supts Vouchers - Approved, Current Year 1962-1963 - c
Membership lists, Invitations to New Supts, Letters to late members
NYS Council of Supts., Affiliated Organizations
Jt. Committee on Athletics Controversy - a
Jt. Committee on Athletics Controversy - b
Relationships - School Boards - State Education Dept.
Council of Supts. Distinguished Service Award
Resolution (Council of City and Village Supts.)
Portfolio of printed pamphlets, "The President's Portfolio" AASA
